title: Implementation Proposal: Self-made Frontend
body:
I'm requesting approval to work for the Rari Capital DAO, specifically to complete one of the approved grants of Batch 1: Self-made frontend.

Design

Here's an interactive prototype:

https://www.figma.com/proto/x1sE2cuSzV9e1645pQADTv/Untitled?node-id=1%3A4&scaling=contain&page-id=0%3A1&hide-ui=1

Icons would be designed to match the logo's vibe, and there's some animations and on hover details that are still missing.

Background

I'm a self-taught full stack developer.

I stumbled upon the crypto art community in twitter really early in 2020 that led me to discover Bitcoin and Ethereum and I fell down the rabbit hole - partly because its super interesting to try to understand the gigabrains in their twitter threads, and partly because I fell in love with its potential to change almost every aspect of human organization and interaction.

At the time, I was working a part-time shift which left me with enough time to study and research. DeFi was getting really big, and I wanted to be a part of that so I started learning web development. That was around last June and it was a little hard and slow at first because of my job, but then on February of this year I was able to start freelancing as a web developer and have been doing that since then.

I don't have any experience with DeFi projects yet, but I'm actively looking to contribute and build a reputation in the space. I have experience with:

React
Nodejs
Javascript
Typescript
Express, Apollo Server
Docker
Kubernetes
Nginx
Solidity
Mongo DB
SQL
And I love UX/UI design.

Specifications

During development, the code would be available in a public GitHub repo - that way my progress is trackable and completely transparent at all times. The platform would be developed with React and Typescript, and hosted in fleek/IPFS to ensure censorship resistance and integrity of the audited source code.

If there are any features that you'd like included please submit a proposal so that the Rari community can vote and discuss e.g. graphs that should be implemented, info that you would like displayed in the layout. The idea is to develop a seamless user experience for the Rari yield/fuse pools.

I would also provide continuous support and feature integration for the project after its been delivered. 


Payment

3500 USDT and an additional 500$ worth of RGT. Payment release would be requested upon completion of the work, after code is audited by the Rari Team.

Timeline

The platform would be delivered by the 15th of July with a 4 day delay at most. I'm asking for an extended amount of time to ensure the highest quality.
author: 0x43F8734296cFc0e41F9ee00e468B23AFA09b7d13
